title: The Richest Man in History Was the 14th c. King of Mali
description: Learn about King Musa, the man so rich he crashed the value of gold in Egypt by giving away too many gifts while on an extended vacation.
itunes:author: Scott Rank, PhD
itunes:subtitle: Learn about King Musa, the man so rich he crashed the value of gold in Egypt by giving away too many gifts while on an extended vacation.
